floatOption.toolTip: Calculated from input clock and dividers\n (Nominally 32kHz)

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables internal voltage regulator. It must have the charge pump enabled

choiceOption.toolTip: Trims the regulated input voltage.\n Each bit in the register has equal weight.\n The regulated input is changed by 1.5% for each count

binaryOption.description: Charge Pump or Resistor Bias Select
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects the whether a charge pump or a resistor network is \n used to supply the LCD voltages VLL1, VLL2, and VLL3

choiceOption.toolTip: Configures SLCD to handle different LCD glass capacitance\n This affects the Resistor Divider (CPSEL=0) or Charge Pump (CPSEL=1)

binaryOption.toolTip: Configures whether the LCD controller power supply is external or internal

choice.name: Drive VLL3 externally from VDD or drive VLL internally from vIREG

choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the duty cycle of the LCD controller driver.\n (Number of back planes, A..H)
